name: Snake (itch) (JohnWebDev)
description:
This was my first Game Jam submission!

Wanted to see what I could make in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam.

I tried to take a rather boring game and make it fun and juicy!

I have some things I would like to  and add later such as particle effects, cheering when beating your hi score, and hmmm a reset button...

CONTROLS: arrow keys

GAME ENGINE: Defold game engine

Trijam #77 submission. Made in 2.5h

Source Code: https://github.com/Kravitzy/Defold-Snake
